wp-admin/

# Ignore files generated by WordPress
wp-config.php
wp-config-sample.php
wp-content/advanced-cache.php
wp-content/backup-db/
wp-content/backups/
wp-content/blogs.dir/
wp-content/cache/
wp-content/upgrade/

wp-content/plugins/hello.php

# Ignore other WordPress files
readme.html
license.txt
wp-load.php
xmlrpc.php
wp-links-opml.php
wp-blog-header.php
wp-cron.php

# Ignore backup files
*.bak
*.log
*.sql
*.tgz

# Ignore development files
node_modules/
